price: So ask them, “Are they more difficult to create or other things We created? We created them[3] from sticky clay.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٖ لَّازِبِۭ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
